name: motorcycle.ts
description: A statically-typed, functional and reactive framework for modern browsers
author: Tylor Steinberger <tlsteinberger167@gmail.com>

scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator --no-compare-link --bug-labels 'Type: Bug' --enhancement-labels 'Type: Feature,Type: Chore' --include-labels 'Type: Feature,Type: Chore,Type: Bug,Type: Breaking,Type: Regression' --user motorcyclets --project motorcycle
scripts.docs: node tools/docs.js && git add **/README.md && git commit -m 'docs(README): rebuild documentation' && git push
scripts.release:post: yarn docs && yarn changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(CHANGELOG): rebuild changelog && git push'
scripts.release:next: yarn release:pre && lerna publish --exact --canary=next --npm-tag=next -- --access=public && yarn release:post
scripts.release: yarn release:pre && lerna publish --exact -- --access=public && yarn release:post
